result.reason: The 'multi-command' likely refers to the MultiSSH feature. Implementing variable substitution (e.g., %User%) in the MultiSSH input allows executing context-aware commands across multiple connections.
result.approach: Modify MultiSshToolStrip.ProcessKeyPress to substitute variables in the input text for each target connection using ExternalToolArgumentParser before sending the keystrokes.
